summary: Winter foliage gives way to fresh, green growth.
descriptionHtml:
Changes a few landscape and plant textures so they have summer hues instead of the default autumnal colours.  This is a personal project and may not be to everyone else\'s tastes, but I hope someone out there gets some enjoyment from it.  Also the LOD for basic ground is still orange as I can\'t work out how to change it, so it will cause some contrast.

You can use any of the textures as they are just Beth\'s originals with the hues changed.

To install: Extract the Zip archive to your data folder.

I discovered after making this that there is already a mod out there that does something similar called \"Summer in Skyrim\".  SIS seems to have greenified everything more extensively and I actually prefer it.  It can be found here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2818&navtag=file/images.php?id=2818&tab=3
author: kibblesticks
